reviews.review_msg: If you are looking for that hot teacher, this ones for you!
Extremely caring and amazing prof those who are criticizing her didn't get to know her. Class is disorganized but she's one of the best profs ive had

He is now one of my fav profs at SFU. It was my TA who marked my stuff and in my opinion she marked quite hard, and I tried very hard and usually get As. said that they all go through stuff together. Id 100% take another class with Everton. He is funny, cool, concise, articulate, and smart. Take his class if you can but dont expect an easy A.

Paul was an amazing professor. He's hilarious and made the class laugh very often. Easy course as well, only read one of the seven books but managed to get an A- through his great explanations of each novel. Would definitely take a class with him again!!

Okay Mr. Budra is my main man. There was a super hot guy in my class and if I could, I'd ask Budra give a speech at our wedding. Jokes aside, Budra was one of the most intelligent, HILARIOUS, enthusiastic and most engaging professors I had last sem. He great gave notes for his slides, and did nothing but try to help his students. Wonderful prof.
